content.question: Beaker <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> contains <math alttext="50 milliliters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of distilled water and beaker <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> contains <math alttext="100 milliliters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="1.0 molar N a C l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NaCl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Solid <math alttext="A g C l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is added to each of the beakers. After thoroughly stirring the contents of the beakers, some solid <math alttext="A g C l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>AgCl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> remains at the bottom of each beaker, as shown above. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: <math alttext="the molar concentration of, A g with a positive one charge" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>Ag</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is zero in both beakers.

<math alttext="the molar concentration of, A g with a positive one charge" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>Ag</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is the same, but not zero, in both beakers.

<math alttext="the molar concentration of, A g with a positive one charge" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>Ag</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is greater in beaker <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="the molar concentration of, A g with a positive one charge" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>Ag</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is greater in beaker <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="the molar concentration of, A g with a positive one charge" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>Ag</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is greater in beaker <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
